content: In six years, Anatoly Karpov and Garry Kasparov played against each other five matches (144 games, 5540 moves) for the world chess championship.
translations: ita:In sei anni, Anatoly Karpov e Garry Kasparov hanno giocato uno contro l'altro cinque incontri (144 partite, 5540 mosse)
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
